page.title: 09 A SCHOOLGIRL-1985-WEST ROW
page.content: I GET UP AT 7 O'CLOCK AND SLUMP DOWNSTAIRS. FOR BREAKFAST I HAVE CORNFLAKES AND COLD MILK. DAD YELLS, "THE BUS WILL SOON BE HERE". I HURRY UPSTAIRS,TRYING TO FIND MY CLOTHES.WHEN I AM READY I GO TO THE BUS STOP AND CHAT TO MY FRIENDS TILL THE BUS COMES. WHEN I GET TO SCHOOL I PLAY UNTIL MR.DAVIES BLOWS THE WHISTLE AND WE TROOP INSIDE.THE OTHER CHILDREN READ WHILE I TAKE THE DINNER REGISTER ROUND. THEN WE GO INTO THE HALL FOR ASSEMBLY. MR.DAVIES READS A STORY AND SAYS A PRAYER. THEN WE GO TO OUR CLASSROOM FOR MATHS, GAMES AND PUZZLES. PLAY TIME FOLLOWS. THEN WE WRITE STORIES. AFTER LUNCH,IT IS GAMES. I PLAY CRICKET,IT IS REALLY FUN. AFTER GAMES WE LISTEN TO A STORY. I GO HOME ON THE BUS,THINKING OF ALL I HAVE DONE TODAY.
